short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculate your fuel costs in Google Maps. Works worldwide: any currency, any car, any fuel units.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Pin the extension, click on the extension icon in the toolbar, input your vehicle data, and your fuel costs will appear below driving distances in Google Maps. 

This extension is still being actively developed, so if you find a bug or want to request a feature please get in touch with me at edfagedeveloper@gmail.com. Alternatively, you can submit an issue on the extension's GitHub at https://github.com/EdFage/fuelCostCalculator.
